H0.text: January 3, 1924 saw Howard Carter discover what famous Egyptian pharaoh. Ramses II

H1.text: January 3, 1924 saw Howard Carter discover what famous Egyptian pharaoh. Thutmose III

H2.text: January 3, 1924 saw Howard Carter discover what famous Egyptian pharaoh. Akhenaten

H3.text: January 3, 1924 saw Howard Carter discover what famous Egyptian pharaoh. Kingtut

A4.text: After a systematic search beginning in 1915, Carter discovered the actual tomb of Tutankhamun (KV62) in November 1922.

A5.text: There were several breaks in the work, including one lasting nearly a year in 1924â€“25, caused by a dispute over what Carter saw as excessive control of the excavation by the Egyptian Antiquities Service.

A6.text: On 16 February 1923, Carter opened the sealed doorway and confirmed it led to a burial chamber, containing the sarcophagus of Tutankhamun.
